name: Spring Home Samosa Pastry
description: The quintessential product for making Spring Rolls and other delicious pastry snacks. Absorbs less oil. Strong tensile – easy to separate and peel. Remains crispy for long periods. Minimal breakage and wastage. Double fry capabilities. Cooking Method: Oven Bake, Deep Fry, Pan Fry, Air Fry *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
